# id

**Instance Property**

A stable ID that you can use to uniquely identify a device.

## Declaration

```swift
let id: WAPairedDevice.ID
```

## Discussion

The ID is stable for the lifetime of a single app install on a single device. This value is the same as the value provided in [https://developer.apple.com/documentation/accessorysetupkit/]’s `ASAccessory/wifiAwarePairedDeviceID`.

## Getting the app-specific identifier

- **WAPairedDevice.ID**: A type of value that uniquely identifies the paired device.
